title: Hype - Rounded Sans
content:
Anybody got any ideas. all i have is this live traced version.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [hype.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080328054248/http:/typophile.com/files/hype.jpg) | 19.9 KB |

 [‹ (x) JCDA Inc sans serif-Rotis Sans Serif {Rob Jones}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080328054248/http:/typophile.com/node/43607 "Go to previous forum topic") [Needs some help ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080328054248/http:/typophile.com/node/43605 "Go to next forum topic")
author: dontbelievethetype

comments.content: Rob, a little more respect please. Try using a title that explains what you’re trying to ID. Like “hype, rounded sans.” It’s a little more helpful and a lot less degrading.

Rob, remember you are being helped _for free_ by the best team of type identifiers in the known universe.

[last part edited for unwanted harshness, sorry’boutthat]
Oops, apologies accepted. Scrap that last comment.

<cite>Sorry Andrew.</cite>

It’s cool, we can take a joke here as long as it’s respectful.

Keep it in mind for the future. Yves carries a banhammer of the gods. It’s similar to Thor’s hammer Mjollnir, but much more powerful in the realm of Typophiles.

Back to work (eh, I mean ‘fun’ of course).

Could be [ITC Ronda](http://web.archive.org/web/20080328054248/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/itc-ronda/familytree.html) with customized ‘y’.

Thanks for that, I think that’s what i’ll have to do  
Cheers
